item.description: Meet our newest member, Carol Ann, in beautiful Marblehead for a day in the sun. She will have croquet ready for us, and other outdoor activities (strolling, Frisbee, etc.) are welcome. The beach is nearby, so bring your beach blankets. This is not a lunch or potluck, so bring your own picnic lunch and soft drinks if you wish.
item.how_to_find_us: See the Bean Pod for directions or request them when you RSVP
item.name: Croquet in May by the Marblehead Shore
